entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:47PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Hot Temperatures Expected This Weekend... Widespread temperatures in the 80s are expected across the Interior this weekend. Highs will be in the mid 80s on Saturday, while Sunday looks to be warmer, with many locations, including Fairbanks, seeing highs in the upper 80s. Make sure to visit weather.gov/fairbanks for the latest forecast
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison and northeastern Limestone Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harvest, or 9 miles northeast of Athens, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Limestone; Madison

The combination of warm temperatures and high dewpoints will produce heat indices between 105 and 109 degrees today. Residents with outdoor activities planned are urged to drink plenty of water, wear light weight and light colored clothing and take frequent breaks from the heat. Young children and pets should never be left
entry.cap:areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands
